features.featureTitle: Update the site’s visual storytelling to reflect a clear “good triumphs over evil” theme while keeping the existing tattoo/rock + premium denim/western embellishment aesthetic (distressed textures, ornate motifs, bold typography). Apply this motif consistently on key pages (at minimum Home and About) via iconography, section headings, and short brand copy updates (English only).

Add and wire up new generated static image assets that visually depict “good triumphs over evil” in the existing style. Update frontend image mapping so the new themed products and/or hero visuals can reference these new assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
